name: Cosmic Awakening VR
description: Cosmic Awakening VR is a first person VR survival exploration horror game. A game about immersion, exploration, and terror. It is a collection of horror scenarios set on a sci-fi stage. Explore the mysteries in a short linear experience, or try to survive as long as you can against unknown horrors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7-3770k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
